title: Shortcuts no longer avaiable on my pixel 2 homescreen. Circular icons are still there, but greyed ou
content:
Verizon support. Zilch.
Google support. Zilch.
Restarted 3x. Updated to Android 11. Don't know if this is a launcher issue. Access to shortcut URLs isn't available from the homescreen "buttons."
Note: Shortcut "buttons" for apps loaded on the phone DO work and are not greyed out
